'''2.4.79''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on May 22, 2023.

== Fixes ==
* Bug fixes for native JRE support on ARM64 devices on Windows.
* {{bug|MCL-23403}} - The Profile Name on the Java Product Page displays the Account's Gamertag instead of their Java Profile Name.</onlyinclude>
